recipe.title: Citrus And Winter Greens Salad Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: ¼ cup ; fresh parsley, chopped ; (10 g)
¼ cup ; apple cider vinegar ; (60 mL)
¼ cup ; orange juice, reserved from supreming oranges if desired. ; (60 mL)
3 cups ; tuscan kale, thinly sliced (1 bunch) ; (300 g)
1 cup ; red cabbage, thinly sliced ; (100 g)
1 ; large fuji apple, cored and thinly sliced
1 cup ; brussels sprouts, thinly sliced (4 ounces, 115 G) ; (115 g)

steps.step: To make the dressing, add the garlic, parsley, scallions, apple cider vinegar, honey, orange juice, Dijon mustard, tahini, and salt to a blender. Blend until smooth. With the blender running, slowly drizzle in the olive oil until the dressing is easily pourable. Set aside until ready to use.
minutes prior to serving the salad, add the kale to a large bowl and season with salt. Gently massage with your hands to break down the tough fibers and reduce bitterness.
Add the red cabbage, apple, Brussels sprouts, orange segments, pepitas, and pomegranate seeds. Toss well to combine. Serve in a bowl or plate and drizzle with dressing to taste.
